column4: i have a problem with the screen resolution, i had 1024 by 800 or something like that, then i shut it down last night and it booted up into 800 by 600. it dosent even show me the option to change it to 1024 by whatever, im running ubuntu
May be 'xrandr' helps you as a first step.
what do i have to do to change it?
I do not know. First, analyse the cause of your trouble.
